amendment.description: An amendment numbered 33 printed in Part B of House Report 116-32 to direct the Secretary of Education to submit a report to Congress regarding an evaluation of programs, events, and educational materials related to domestic violence, dating violence, sexual assault, and stalking and an assessment of best practices and guidance. The report should be made publicly available online to universities and college campuses to use as a resource.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Craig amendment (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A033) offered by Mrs. Craig.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Craig amendment (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.
